mapper.select: select MODEL_ID as "modelId" , MODEL_DESC as "modelName" from aud_audit_model where MODEL_STATUS != '-1' and AUDIT_TYPE = #{auditType}
select distinct MODEL_TYPE "modelType", MODEL_TYPE_DESC "modelDesc" from dim_index_type order by to_number("modelType")
select DATA_AREA_ID "org_id",to_char(nvl(count(1),0)) "count" from WF_WORKORDER where AUDIT_CYCLE = #{date} and DATA_AREA_ID=#{orgId} and status!='3' group by DATA_AREA_ID

select AUDIT_CYCLE "date",to_char(nvl(count(1),0)) "count" from WF_WORKORDER where to_number(AUDIT_CYCLE)<= to_number(#{date}) and to_number(AUDIT_CYCLE)>= to_number(#{oleDate}) and DATA_AREA_ID=#{orgId} and status!='3' group by AUDIT_CYCLE
